SRP.Q: In 2000, what is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the line representing Emerald Capital relative to Apex Credit?
SRP.A: In 2000, Emerald Capital is {above} Apex Credit in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: On Aura Finance, what is the spatial relationship of the data point in 2003 relative to that in 1993 in terms of vertical (above/below) and horizontal (left/right) directions?
SRP.A: On Aura Finance, the data point in 2003 is {below} and to the {right} of the data point in 1993.

VPR.Q: What is the trend of Aura Finance's Mortgage Rate levels?
VPR.A: Aura Finance's mortgage rate levels show a {bimodal valley} trend.

VPR.Q: What is the trend of Titan Lending's Mortgage Rate levels?

VPR.Q: What is the trend of Emerald Capital's Mortgage Rate levels?
VPR.A: Emerald Capital's mortgage rate levels show a {exponential rising} trend.

VPR.Q: What is the trend of Horizon Funding's Mortgage Rate levels?
VPR.A: Horizon Funding's mortgage rate levels show a {bimodal valley} trend.
